mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no as scheduleNo ,teacher_no as teacherNo ,license_kindergarten as licenseKindergarten ,category_no as categoryNo ,schedule_content as scheduleContent ,schedule_start_day as scheduleStartDay ,schedule_end_day as scheduleEndDay ,schedule_title as scheduleTitle ,schedule_time as scheduleTime FROM schedule WHERE license_kindergarten = #{licenseKindergarten}
